entries.original:
The following are additional control not part of the key mapping schema:

Autopilot: CTRL + Left-click
Autopilot, Direct Route: CTRL + ALT + Left-click
Target Selection: Right-click
Dev Console: F11
entries.translation:
以下是不属于键映射架构一部分的附加控制：

自动驾驶仪：CTRL + 左键单击
自动驾驶仪，直接路线：CTRL + ALT + 左键单击
目标选择：右键单击
开发控制台：F11

entries.original: Controller support is currently experimental and may not work as expected for all features, such as in the Station. Controls: Steering: Left joystick to set desired direction. Hold for 5 seconds to enable cruise control. Turbo: Left joystick down to toggle turbo thrust. Weapons: Right joystick to fire plasma turrets. Interact: A Button Toggle Map: Y Button Pan map, Gateway Select: Right joystick Toggle Ship Status: X Button Cycle Secondary Weapon (if secondary weapons installed): D-Pad Up/Down Cycle Power-ups (if available): D-Pad Right/Left
entries.translation: 控制器支持目前处于实验阶段，所有功能可能无法按预期工作，例如在车站中。 控制： 操舵： 左操纵杆设置所需方向。按住 5 秒可启用巡航控制。 涡轮： 左操纵杆向下可切换涡轮推力。 武器： 右操纵杆可发射等离子炮塔。 相互影响： 一个按钮 切换地图： Y 按钮 泛地图，网关选择： 右操纵杆 切换船舶状态： X按钮 循环副武器（如果安装了副武器）： 方向键向上/向下 循环加电（如果有）： 方向键右/左

entries.original:
Hi there!

The game is still in Early Access. In anticipation of general release, I have begun work on the localization system. All text (including this) has been experimentally translated using Google Translate. It may be confusing, missing, or wrong in places. When the game's content is close to completion, some languages will be professionally translated. Other languages will hopefully receive corrections/improvements from players. 

Until then, please visit the <u><link="https://steamcommunity.com/app/1750770/discussions/1/">Steam discussion forums for more details and to give feedback.</link></u>

Thanks for your patience and thanks for playing Starcom: Unknown Space!

- Kevin

p.s. If you cannot read English, the confirmation dialogue that appeared at first launch was an opt-in/out for analytics. The analytics is anonymous and contains no personally identifiable information. If you would like to change your preference, you may do so from the options menu.
entries.translation:
你好呀！

该游戏仍处于抢先体验阶段。为了期待全面发布，我已经开始了本地化系统的工作。所有文本（包括本文本）均已使用谷歌翻译进行了实验性翻译。它可能在某些地方令人困惑、缺失或错误。当游戏内容接近完成时，某些语言将得到专业翻译。其他语言有望得到玩家的修正/改进。

在此之前，请访问 <u><link="https://steamcommunity.com/app/1750770/discussions/1/">Steam 论坛了解更多详细信息并提供反馈。</link></u>

感谢您的耐心等待，也感谢您玩《星传：未知空间》！

- 凯文

附注如果您看不懂英语，则首次启动时出现的确认对话框是选择加入/退出分析。分析是匿名的，不包含个人身份信息。如果您想更改偏好设置，可以从选项菜单中进行操作。

entries.original: Capture an image of your vessel for posterity. Rotate ship with steering controls.
entries.translation: 为后代拍摄您的船只的图像。使用转向控制装置旋转船舶。

entries.original:
Thanks for playing Starcom: Unknown Space!

During Early Access, your feedback is very important to help me improve the game and make it the best experience it can be. You can leave anonymous feedback at any point in game by pressing the F8 key. You can also post in the game's Steam Discussion forums.

Also, the game collects anonymous data on your gameplay and basic system specs to identify and fix bugs, performance issues, and otherwise improve players' experience. If you wish, you can disable this below (or in game preferences). 

Thanks again for your support of Starcom: Unknown Space!

- Kevin
entries.translation:
感谢您玩《星传：未知空间》！

在抢先体验期间，您的反馈对于帮助我改进游戏并使其成为最佳体验非常重要。您可以在游戏中随时按 F8 键留下匿名反馈。您还可以在游戏的 Steam 讨论论坛中发帖。

此外，游戏还会收集有关您的游戏玩法和基本系统规格的匿名数据，以识别和修复错误、性能问题，并以其他方式改善玩家体验。如果您愿意，您可以在下面（或在游戏偏好设置中）禁用此功能。

再次感谢您对《星传：未知空间》的支持！

- 凯文

entries.original: Xenoculture
entries.translation: 异种培养

entries.original:
Study of alien language, culture and thought. Officers with high Xenoculture are better able to understand alien motivations, make inferences from their artifacts, and conduct negotiations. 

This is the most frequently used skill for insights and skill checks during anomalies and alien interactions.
entries.translation:
研究外来语言、文化和思想。具有高度异种文化的官员能够更好地理解外星人的动机，从他们的文物中做出推断，并进行谈判。

这是异常和外星人互动期间最常用的洞察和技能检查技能。

entries.original: Tactics
entries.translation: 策略

entries.original: Improves Tactical skill checks and increases the likelihood of related insights during anomaly surveys, such as those involving hostile actions.
entries.translation: 改进战术技能检查并增加异常调查（例如涉及敌对行动的调查）期间获得相关见解的可能性。

entries.original: Observation
entries.translation: 观察

entries.original: Improves Observation skill checks and increases the likelihood of Observation insights during anomaly surveys. These include searching areas or noticing subtle details.
entries.translation: 改进观察技能检查并增加异常调查期间观察洞察的可能性。这些包括搜索区域或注意微妙的细节。

entries.original: Engineering
entries.translation: 工程

entries.original: Improves Engineering skill checks and increases the likelihood of Engineering insights during anomaly surveys and alien interactions. These are most likely to occur while investing alien artifacts or technology.
entries.translation: 改进工程技能检查并增加异常调查和外星人互动期间获得工程见解的可能性。这些最有可能在投资外星文物或技术时发生。

entries.translation: 改进技能检查并增加获得与生命科学、生物学和医学相关的见解的可能性。

entries.translation: 提高技能检查以及获得与行星和天文学科学相关的见解的可能性。

entries.original: Dreadnought Bridge
entries.translation: 无畏舰桥

entries.original:
The nerve center of a starship, the bridge provides baseline energy generation and reserves, crew capacity and other core functions. Critical damage to the bridge will result in total loss of the vessel.

Cruiser class vessels can be up to 100 hexes in size.
entries.translation:
作为星舰的神经中枢，舰桥提供基线能量生成和储备、乘员容量和其他核心功能。桥梁的严重损坏将导致船只完全损失。

巡洋舰级船只的尺寸可达 100 个六角形。

entries.translation: 侦察兵桥

entries.original: Bulkhead
entries.translation: 舱壁

entries.original: Bulkheads reinforce adjacent modules, reducing the damage they take. They also have relatively high hull strength, increasing the amount of damage your ship can take.
entries.translation: 舱壁加固了相邻的模块，减少了它们受到的损坏。它们还具有相对较高的船体强度，增加了您的船舶可以承受的损坏程度。

entries.original: Plasma weapons fire bolts of ionized magnetically confined gas. Fast, directed and medium range, they are a good general purpose weapon.
entries.translation: 等离子武器发射电离磁约束气体的箭。快速、定向和中程，它们是一种很好的通用武器。

entries.original: Dorsal Stabilizer
entries.translation: 背部稳定器

entries.original: Technically a Void Control Surface, "stabilizers" increase a vessel's speed in deep space (the so-called Void Effect). This design also helps slightly with maneuverability.
entries.translation: 从技术上讲，“稳定器”是一个虚空控制面，可以提高飞船在深空的速度（所谓的虚空效应）。这种设计也对可操作性略有帮助。

entries.original: Lateral Strut
entries.translation: 横向支撑

entries.original: Survey Lander
entries.translation: 勘测着陆器

entries.original: A surveyor craft is a small but versatile ship that allows survey teams to study planetary anomalies. Contains a mobile lab, mining equipment and med bay. Maximum crew of six.
entries.translation: 测量船是一艘小型但多功能的船，可让测量团队研究行星异常。包含移动实验室、采矿设备和医疗室。最多六名船员。

entries.original: Warp Generator

entries.translation: 生成局部扭曲场，允许短距离、近乎瞬时的移动。

entries.original:
Set the game's resolution and refresh rate. Refresh rate has no effect
unless full screen mode is set to "Exclusive".
entries.translation:
设置游戏的分辨率和刷新率。刷新率没有影响
除非全屏模式设置为“独占”。

entries.original:
Sync frames to your monitor's refresh rate. Disabling reduces 
input latency at the expense of possible screen tearing.
entries.translation:
将帧与显示器的刷新率同步。禁用会减少
输入延迟以可能的屏幕撕裂为代价。

entries.original:
Exlusive full screen may give slightly better performance.
Full screen windowed allows easier switching between applications.
Windowed if your boss is nearby?
entries.translation:
独家全屏可能会带来稍微更好的性能。
全屏窗口允许更轻松地在应用程序之间切换。
如果你的老板在附近，就开窗吗？

entries.original: Small foreground particles visible when the ship is in motion. Decrease this to reduce CPU load on older machines.
entries.translation: 当船舶运动时，可以看到小的前景粒子。减少此值可以减少旧机器上的 CPU 负载。

entries.original: Lens flare visual effect on stars and large explosions.
entries.translation: 星星和大爆炸的镜头眩光视觉效果。

entries.original:
Post-process bloom adds additional glow around bright objects, some
 performance cost. Auto-disabled below "High" quality setting.
entries.translation:
后期处理光晕在明亮物体周围添加了额外的光芒，有些
 性能成本。在“高”质量设置以下自动禁用。

entries.original:
Display the ship's current orientation vector. This
can help with navigation, particularly during combat.
entries.translation:
显示船舶当前的方向矢量。这
可以帮助导航，特别是在战斗中。

entries.original:
Use mouse to steer ship (can overriden by 
keyboard input and autopilot)
entries.translation:
使用鼠标来驾驶船只（可以通过
键盘输入和自动驾驶仪）

entries.original: How quickly crew notifications are automatically dismissed.
entries.translation: 自动消除机组人员通知的速度。

entries.original:
Some key information such as thermal module analysis is presented 
as a color gradient; activating color-blind mode uses an alternate
color scheme.
entries.translation:
提供了热模块分析等一些关键信息
作为颜色渐变；激活色盲模式使用替代方法
配色方案。

entries.original: Use a higher-contrast version of the targeting reticule.
entries.translation: 使用更高对比度版本的目标标线。

entries.original: Scanline/distortion effects on dialogue and anomaly images.
entries.translation: 扫描线/扭曲对对话和异常图像的影响。

entries.original:
The game collects anonymous analytics data 
to improve performance, identify problem areas,
etc.
entries.translation:
该游戏收集匿名分析数据
提高绩效，识别问题领域，
ETC。

entries.original:
Hi there!

Starcom: Unknown Space is currently still in Early Access. In anticipation of 
general release, I have begun work on the localization system. I am not yet at 
the point of determining which languages to professionally translate, but I 
wanted to start testing the translation logic and code.

Currently, all translations (including this) were done automatically with 
Google Cloud Translate. The main purpose of this is to find out if any of the 
translation system is broken (as opposed to merely confusing).

Please post any impressions in the Steam Discussion forums.

- Kevin
entries.translation:
你好呀！

星传：未知空间目前仍处于抢先体验阶段。预计
正式发布后，我已经开始本地化系统的工作。我还没有到
确定专业翻译哪些语言的重点，但我
想要开始测试翻译逻辑和代码。

目前，所有翻译（包括此翻译）都是通过以下命令自动完成的
谷歌云翻译。这样做的主要目的是查明是否存在以下情况：
翻译系统被破坏（而不是仅仅令人困惑）。

请在 Steam 讨论论坛中发布任何印象。

- 凯文

entries.original: Cargo Hauler
entries.translation: 货物搬运车

entries.original: Hmmm... I don't think I have [SHIP_NAME] listed for any assignments in this sector. Are you sure you're where you're supposed to be?
entries.translation: 嗯...我认为我没有为该部门的任何任务列出[SHIP_NAME]。你确定你在你应该在的地方吗？

entries.original: I think we're lost.
entries.translation: 我想我们迷路了。

entries.original:
Really wet behind the ears, aren't we? I think you're supposed to be in the Maia System. Galactic North East from here.

I'm sure your first officer knows where it is.
entries.translation:
耳朵后面真的很湿，不是吗？我认为你应该在玛亚系统中。从这里开始银河东北。

我相信你的大副知道它在哪里。

entries.original: Just looking for a little adventure.
entries.translation: 只是寻找一点冒险。

entries.original:
I see a lot of fresh commanders who want the same. But we have to earn it with experience.

Funny, when I first saw you, I was reminded of a young commander I met maybe twenty years ago.
entries.translation:
我看到很多新任指挥官也有同样的愿望。但我们必须通过经验来赢得它。

有趣的是，当我第一次见到你时，我想起了二十年前我认识的一位年轻指挥官。

entries.original:
That tenderfoot wanted adventure, too. All I had to offer was a delivery run. 

You know what? 

No one ever saw that ship again. Disappeared the same time Kite I vanished. Before your time, but I'm sure you read about it at the academy. Searched for a year with dozens of ships, never found a trace.
entries.translation:
那个新手也想要冒险。我所要做的就是送货。

你知道吗？

没有人再见过那艘船。风筝一号消失的同时也消失了。在你之前，但我相信你在学院读过它。数十艘船只搜寻了一年，始终没有找到踪迹。

entries.original: I think you should return to your *assigned* mission and be careful what you wish for.
entries.translation: 我认为你应该回到你的“分配的”使命并小心你的愿望。

entries.original: As you were, commander.
entries.translation: 就像你一样，指挥官。

entries.original:
*You are in Starcom Restricted Space. All Starcom vessels require category S clearance to dock.

This is an automated message.*
entries.translation:
*您处于 Starcom 限制空间内。所有 Starcom 船舶都需要 S 类许可才能停靠。

这是一条自动消息。*

entries.original: Thank you for responding to our priority message. Normally this would go through Starcom Fleet HQ, but we have an urgent situation.
entries.translation: 感谢您回复我们的优先信息。通常情况下，这会通过星传舰队总部，但我们有紧急情况。

entries.original:
We've received an emergency beacon from our outpost on the other side of a quantum wormhole.

They must have a critical emergency. I need you to activate the two nearby neutrino generators that will expand the wormhole large enough for us to get through to them.
entries.translation:
我们从量子虫洞另一边的前哨站收到了紧急信标。

他们一定遇到了紧急情况。我需要你激活附近的两个中微子发生器，将虫洞扩大到足够大，以便我们能够到达它们。

entries.original:
I know you haven't been briefed on this, but our support ship was damaged by debris and is en route to Merope for repairs.

Any questions?
entries.translation:
我知道你还没有获悉此事，但我们的支援船被碎片损坏，正在前往梅洛普进行维修的途中。

任何问题？

entries.original: No sir, we'll activate those generators right away.
entries.translation: 不，先生，我们会立即启动这些发电机。

entries.original:
Glad to hear it. I'm transmitting the override codes to you now. You'll just need to get close enough to them.

I should say that this project is classified. 

Report back once the wormhole is open and I'll fill you in on what you are permitted to discuss.
entries.translation:
听到那个消息很开心。我现在正在将覆盖代码发送给您。你只需要离他们足够近就可以了。

我应该说这个项目是机密的。

虫洞打开后请报告，我会告诉您可以讨论的内容。

entries.original: I have so many questions.
entries.translation: 我有很多问题。

entries.original:
I'm not surprised.

This project is classified for reasons I can't go into. But I can't order you to help us, so I'll tell you what I can.
entries.translation:
我不惊讶。

由于我无法详细说明的原因，该项目被分类。但我不能命令你帮助我们，所以我会告诉你我能做什么。

entries.original: What's a quantum wormhole and where does it lead?
entries.translation: 什么是量子虫洞？它通向哪里？

entries.original:
It's a primordial wormhole that formed during our universe's inflationary epoch. Until recently, they were a theoretical solution to certain cosmological models. We believed that if any existed, they would have collapsed billions of years ago.

Then we discovered this one.
entries.translation:
这是一个在宇宙暴胀时期形成的原始虫洞。直到最近，它们还是某些宇宙学模型的理论解决方案。我们相信，如果有任何存在的话，它们就会在数十亿年前崩溃。

然后我们就发现了这个。

entries.original: As for where it leads, I can't say. Partly because Starcom Defense Division has classified the information, but also because I don't actually know.
entries.translation: 至于它会走向何方，我不能说。部分原因是星康防御部门已对这些信息进行了保密，但也因为我实际上并不知道。

entries.original: Why the secrecy?
entries.translation: 为什么要保密？

entries.original:
The reasons for this project being classified are also classified, I'm afraid.

Frankly, I think Defense Division haven't had a major project under their control in a while and it's gone to their heads.
entries.translation:
这个项目被分类的原因恐怕也是被分类的。

坦率地说，我认为国防部已经有一段时间没有在他们的控制下进行重大项目了，这让他们头脑发热。

entries.original: Is there anything that you can tell us?
entries.translation: 您有什么可以告诉我们的吗？

entries.original:
According to early research papers, the wormhole may lead to a universe that was separated from ours during the early expansion of the universe.

We sent Celaeno Station through a month ago and they have begun studying the region.
entries.translation:
根据早期的研究论文，虫洞可能通向一个在宇宙早期膨胀过程中与我们的宇宙分离的宇宙。

一个月前我们派塞拉埃诺站通过，他们已经开始研究该地区。

entries.original:
It takes a huge amount of energy to expand the wormhole large enough to send ships through, so normally we only expand it for scheduled supply runs.

They do have a way to send a very low-bandwidth signal through in case of emergencies, and that's what we received.

I'll be able to tell you more once the wormhole is expanded and you've been given clearance.
entries.translation:
将虫洞扩大到足以让船只通过需要消耗大量的能量，所以通常我们只在预定的补给运行时扩大它。

他们确实有办法在紧急情况下发送非常低带宽的信号，这就是我们收到的。

一旦虫洞扩大并且你获得许可，我就能告诉你更多信息。

entries.original: Okay, we'll get those stabilizers up and running.
entries.translation: 好的，我们会让这些稳定器启动并运行。

entries.original: I need you to get those generators activated ASAP, commander.
entries.translation: 我需要你尽快启动这些发电机，指挥官。

entries.original: Good job getting those stabilizers activated, but I'm a bit pressed for time at the moment.
entries.translation: 很好，激活了这些稳定器，但我现在时间有点紧迫。

entries.original: Wrecked Cargo Ship
entries.translation: 失事货船

entries.original: Alongside the disabled vessel, [SHIP_NAME] downloads the cargo manifest declaration.
entries.translation: 除了瘫痪的船只之外，[SHIP_NAME] 还下载了货物舱单声明。

entries.original:
"Cargo contents: misc. waste collected from salvage of Alcyone Station, including:

Abandoned personal effects 
Growing soil with heavy metal contaminants
Non-recoverable technical equipment
Deteriorating Xenium (Caution: Extremely Volatile)"
entries.translation:
“货物内容：从昴宿星站打捞中收集到的杂项废物，包括：

废弃的个人物品
种植含有重金属污染物的土壤
不可恢复的技术装备
恶化的 Xenium（注意：极度不稳定）”

entries.original: The Secret Artifact
entries.translation: 秘密神器

entries.original: On the barren surface of this dead, rocky world, the survey team is surprised to discover a strange artifact.
entries.translation: 在这个死气沉沉的岩石世界的贫瘠表面上，调查小组惊讶地发现了一件奇怪的文物。

entries.original:
Wait.

How are you surveying this planet? You don't get the survey module until entering Remnant space. You cheated, didn't you.

No artifact for you.
entries.translation:
等待。

你如何勘察这个星球？在进入遗迹空间之前你不会得到调查模块。你作弊了，不是吗？

没有适合你的神器。

entries.original: Full test of Alpha to Arrival
entries.translation: 从阿尔法到抵达的全面测试

entries.original: Cargo Spill
entries.translation: 货物泄漏

entries.original:
An abandoned cargo hauler has spilled its contents near Maia Alpha II. This is inside the security zone of a Starcom base.

We need to determine if there was anything hazardous.
entries.translation:
一辆废弃的货运车在玛亚阿尔法二号附近泄漏了里面的东西。这里位于星康基地的安全区内。

我们需要确定是否存在任何危险。

entries.original:
We've received our first set of orders. A vessel was damaged by debris from a wrecked cargo ship.

I'm marking the location on your HUD.
entries.translation:
我们已经收到了第一批订单。一艘船只被失事货船的碎片损坏。

我正在你的 HUD 上标记位置。

entries.original: [FORWARD][LEFT][BACK][RIGHT] to steer
entries.translation: [前进][左][后][右]转向

entries.original: The cargo ship was last spotted at [COORD] near a gas giant. We should be able to find its manifest on board.
entries.translation: 这艘货船最后一次被发现是在一颗气态巨行星附近的[COORD]。我们应该能够在船上找到它的舱单。

entries.original: You can review mission details as well as other ship information in the ship's console.
entries.translation: 您可以在船舶控制台中查看任务详细信息以及其他船舶信息。

entries.original: Press [Z] to open the ship console
entries.translation: 按[Z]打开船舶控制台

entries.original: We're closing on the vessel. Looks like there are several dozen containers loose. I suggest we approach with caution until we know what's in them.
entries.translation: 我们正在关闭这艘船。看起来有几十个集装箱松动了。我建议我们谨慎行事，直到我们知道其中有什么。

entries.original: Some of the spilled cargo contain an unstable material. We should carefully try to clear as many as we can.
entries.translation: 一些泄漏的货物含有不稳定的物质。我们应该小心翼翼地尝试尽可能多地清除。

entries.original: Degraded Xenium is dangerous stuff.  We should try to destroy the loose containers... carefully.
entries.translation: 退化的 Xenium 是危险的东西。我们应该小心地尝试销毁松散的容器。

entries.original:
We can destroy the containers with our plasma cannon.

Again, I'd suggest keeping as much distance as possible.
entries.translation:
我们可以用等离子炮摧毁容器。

再次，我建议保持尽可能远的距离。

entries.original: Use mouse to target and fire plasma cannon
entries.translation: 使用鼠标瞄准并发射等离子炮

entries.original: There probably wasn't anything important on that ship anyway.
entries.translation: 无论如何，那艘船上可能没有什么重要的东西。

entries.original:
I'm getting a priority emergency beacon on the Starcom open hyperwave. It's from Maia Station: they're asking any nearby ships to report immediately.

Looks like this cleanup operation will have to wait.
entries.translation:
我在星康开放超波上获得优先紧急信标。来自玛亚站：他们要求附近的船只立即报告。

看起来这个清理操作必须等待。

entries.original: Just wanted to make sure you heard me mention the "emergency priority override."
entries.translation: 只是想确保您听到我提到“紧急优先级优先”。

entries.original: Well, it's good that we cleared that dangerous debris. It's less good that we ignored every word in the phrase "emergency priority override," but let's not focus on that and get to Maia station.
entries.translation: 嗯，很高兴我们清除了那些危险的碎片。不太好，我们忽略了“紧急优先优先权”这句话中的每一个字，但我们不要关注这个，去马亚站吧。

entries.original: Death by Misadventure
entries.translation: 意外身亡

entries.original:
Incident Report:

[SHIP_NAME] was destroyed while on a mission to investigate a cargo spill.

[PLAYER_NAME] apparently was unaware that the cargo contained dangerous compounds and may have collided with or fired upon the cargo.
entries.translation:
事件报告：

[SHIP_NAME] 在执行调查货物泄漏的任务时被摧毁。

[PLAYER_NAME]显然没有意识到货物中含有危险化合物，并且可能与货物相撞或向货物开火。

entries.original: I think maybe we're a bit off course from our mission, sir?
entries.translation: 我想也许我们有点偏离我们的使命了，长官？

entries.original: Definitely not on course for our mission objective.
entries.translation: 绝对没有达到我们的任务目标。

entries.original:
Sometimes I ask myself "why not abandon my duties, steal a starship and head off on my own adventure?"

Then I think, "Oh right, court martial."
entries.translation:
有时我问自己“为什么不放弃我的职责，偷一艘星际飞船，开始我自己的冒险呢？”

然后我想，“哦，对了，军事法庭。”

entries.original: Dereliction of Duty
entries.translation: 失职

entries.original:
And so the [SHIP_NAME] set off into the void in search of adventure, until First Officer Avery received orders to confine [PLAYER_NAME] to quarters for dereliction of duty. Avery was promoted to commander and the former commander was demoted and court martialed.

[PLAYER_NAME] was sentenced to two years of admin duty on the remote outpost of Draconix II. Their sentence ended prematurely when the universe unexpectedly collapsed into a singularity.
entries.translation:
于是，[SHIP_NAME]出发进入虚空去寻找冒险，直到大副艾弗里收到命令，以玩忽职守为由将[PLAYER_NAME]限制在宿舍内。艾弗里被提升为指挥官，前任指挥官被降职并送上军事法庭。

[PLAYER_NAME] 被判处在 Draconix II 远程前哨站执行两年管理职责。当宇宙意外地塌缩成一个奇点时，他们的判决提前结束了。

entries.original: Emergency Priority Override
entries.translation: 紧急优先优先权

entries.original: We've received an all-hands emergency broadcast from Maia Station.
entries.translation: 我们收到了来自玛亚站的全体紧急广播。

entries.original: Report to Maia Station immediately for new orders.
entries.translation: 立即向玛亚站报告新订单。

entries.original: Activate Stabilizer One
entries.translation: 激活稳定器一

entries.original: Activate Stabilizer Two
entries.translation: 激活稳定器二

entries.original:
That's one of the stabilizers. 

That thing is putting out a huge amount of energy. I'm reading over 800 terawatts.
entries.translation:
这是稳定剂之一。

那东西正在释放出巨大的能量。我读到超过 800 太瓦。

entries.original: That shockwave knocked out bridge control. I'm trying to restart our systems.
entries.translation: 那股冲击波摧毁了舰桥控制系统。我正在尝试重新启动我们的系统。

entries.original:
What the fleck! Whoever or whatever that is just punched through Maia Station like their neutronium hull was aluminum.

Re-routing helm control to auxiliary, just a few more seconds...
entries.translation:
什么斑点啊！无论是谁或什么东西刚刚穿过玛亚空间站，就像他们的中子外壳是铝一样。

将舵控制重新路由到辅助，只需几秒钟......

entries.original: Byzantium
entries.translation: 拜占庭

entries.original: Cargo Hauler
entries.translation: 货物搬运车

entries.original: Maia Station
entries.translation: 马亚站

entries.original: Starcom Scout
entries.translation: 星传侦察员

entries.original: Start
entries.translation: 开始

entries.original: Cmd Dolson
entries.translation: 多尔森命令

entries.original: Aletheia
entries.translation: 真理

entries.original: Red Raiders
entries.translation: 红色攻略

entries.original: Starcom Debris
entries.translation: 星康碎片

entries.original:
This is Captain Dolson, commander of The Aletheia. It's good to see another Starcom vessel.

While investigating an anomaly, we were confronted by a group of vessels identifying themselves as of "The Devout". I'm not sure what we said wrong, but they started firing on us. They caught us by surprise and our reactor took heavy damage.
entries.translation:
我是多尔森船长，真理号的指挥官。很高兴看到另一艘星康飞船。

在调查异常情况时，我们遇到了一群自称“虔诚者”的船只。我不知道我们说错了什么，但他们开始向我们开枪。他们让我们措手不及，我们的反应堆遭到严重损坏。

entries.original: Do you need an escort back?
entries.translation: 需要有人护送回来吗？

entries.original:
Good of you to offer, but unless we encounter larger numbers we should be alright.

I didn't expect an attack, which is my own fault. We'll be ready next time.
entries.translation:
你的提议很好，但除非我们遇到更多的人，否则我们应该没问题。

我没想到会遭到攻击，这是我自己的错。下次我们会准备好。

entries.original: *Tell the Aletheia's commander about the wormhole gateways.*
entries.translation: *将虫洞网关的事告诉阿勒忒亚号的指挥官。*

entries.original:
So Rama was right.

Well, this good news will shorten our travel time back quite a bit. Thanks for this information.
entries.translation:
所以罗摩是对的。

嗯，这个好消息将使我们的旅行时间缩短不少。感谢您提供此信息。

entries.original: Did you find anything during your interrupted survey?
entries.translation: 您在中断的调查期间有什么发现吗？

entries.original:
As a matter of fact, we did. When we were attacked we had just finished investigating a reliquary in a meteor crater.

Some interesting scrolls and a strange object. We haven't been able to analyze it due to the damage. We'll transfer it to your ship.
entries.translation:
事实上，我们做到了。当我们遭到袭击时，我们刚刚完成对流星陨石坑中的圣物箱的调查。

一些有趣的卷轴和一个奇怪的物体。由于损坏，我们无法对其进行分析。我们会将其转移到您的船上。

entries.original: What can I do for you [PLAYER_NAME]?
entries.translation: 我能为你做什么[PLAYER_NAME]？

entries.original:
Good to see you again, [PLAYER_NAME].

As you can see, we made it back in one piece. Now we're reviewing survey data and patrolling this sector. We detected ship movement at the sector's void periphery shortly after we returned, but they fell back when we investigated.
entries.translation:
很高兴再次见到你，[PLAYER_NAME]。

正如你所看到的，我们把它完整地恢复了。现在我们正在审查调查数据并在该区域进行巡逻。我们返回后不久，就在该区域的虚空外围发现了船只的移动，但当我们调查时，它们又回落了。

entries.original: Perhaps we could continue this conversation when my command crew aren't at battlestations.
entries.translation: 也许当我的指挥人员不在战场时我们可以继续这个谈话。

entries.original:
How goes it, [PLAYER_NAME]?

We're continuing to piece together a history of this space from our archaeological findings and your recent discoveries.
entries.translation:
怎么样，[PLAYER_NAME]？

我们将继续根据我们的考古发现和你们最近的发现拼凑出这个空间的历史。

entries.original: What have you learned about the history of this space?
entries.translation: 您对这个空间的历史了解了什么？

entries.original:
Quite a bit, but it's fragmented.

The broad history, as you may have gathered, is until roughly 800 years ago the dominant power was an empire that controlled most of the space, generally referred to as the "Fallen Empire".
entries.translation:
相当多，但是很碎片化。

正如您可能已经了解的那样，整个历史是直到大约 800 年前，主导力量还是一个控制大部分空间的帝国，通常被称为“堕落帝国”。

entries.original:
I get the impression they took credit for the Remnant artifacts and apparently had access to some we have not seen. 

While it was a very powerful civilization compared to us, they clearly were far below the Remnants in capabilities.
entries.translation:
我的印象是他们把遗迹文物归功于他们，并且显然可以接触到一些我们没有见过的东西。

虽然与我们相比，这是一个非常强大的文明，但他们的能力显然远远低于遗迹。

entries.original: What caused the empire's collapse?
entries.translation: 是什么导致了帝国的崩溃？

entries.original:
Difficult to say, because the empire's own records predictably describe everything as great. But they were clearly experiencing problems for a long time before the end. "Gradually, and then suddenly" as it were.

My current pet theory is infighting within the empire's power structure and a popular religious movement took advantage of this.
entries.translation:
很难说，因为帝国自己的记录不出所料地将一切描述为伟大。但他们显然在结束前很长一段时间都遇到了问题。可以说是“逐渐地，然后突然地”。

我目前最喜欢的理论是帝国权力结构内部的内讧，而流行的宗教运动利用了这一点。

entries.original: And the religious movement would be the Devout?
entries.translation: 宗教运动将是虔诚者？

entries.original: A reasonable guess and confirmed by the Goryr's account.
entries.translation: 这是一个合理的猜测，并得到了戈里尔的叙述的证实。

entries.original: What did the records say about The Remnants?
entries.translation: 关于《遗迹》，记录里说了些什么？

entries.original:
Very little.

Most in the Empire seemed to regard them as either divine or just fundamentally mysterious. It didn't seem occupy a large part of the historic record. Like how humans might have regarded gravity thousands of years ago. 

Not a great analogy, but I'm trying to describe how an alien civilization that we don't understand, didn't understand something that we also don't understand. It's "we don't know" all the way down.
entries.translation:
很少。

帝国中的大多数人似乎都认为它们要么是神圣的，要么就是根本上神秘的。它似乎并没有占据历史记录的很大一部分。就像几千年前人类如何看待重力一样。

这不是一个很好的类比，但我试图描述一个我们不理解的外星文明如何不理解我们也不理解的东西。自始至终都是“我们不知道”。

entries.original: All for now.
entries.translation: 暂时就这样吧。

entries.original: What can you tell me about the ship that destroyed Maia Station?
entries.translation: 关于摧毁玛亚空间站的那艘船，你能告诉我什么吗？

entries.original: After reviewing your logs of the incident, I can only say that it's way more powerful than anything we could build. Maia has, or rather had, Neutronium reinforced plating. Even directed antimatter should have taken longer to get through.
entries.translation: 在查看了您的事件日志后，我只能说它比我们可以构建的任何东西都强大得多。 Maia 有，或者更确切地说，有中子强化镀层。即使是定向反物质也应该需要更长的时间才能通过。

entries.original: What can you tell me about these Red Raiders?
entries.translation: 关于这些红色袭击者，你能告诉我什么吗？

entries.original: That Cdre Yu dropped the ball calling them "Red Raiders." We should have called them "Rouge Rogues."
entries.translation: 于中队长把他们称为“红色袭击者”。我们应该称他们为“Rouge Rogues”。

entries.original: Okay, obviously, but besides that?
entries.translation: 好吧，显然，但除此之外呢？

entries.original:
Besides that, they're technologically a bit behind Starcom. I'm confident Celaeno can hold them off, unless they come at us with bigger ships or in much bigger numbers.

It seems unlikely they were made by whoever destroyed Maia Station.
entries.translation:
除此之外，他们在技术上还落后于星康。我相信塞拉诺能够抵挡住他们，除非他们用更大的船只或者更多的数量来攻击我们。

它们似乎不太可能是摧毁玛亚空间站的人制造的。

entries.original: Any tips on speeding up deep space travel?
entries.translation: 有什么加快深空旅行速度的建议吗？

entries.original: I assume you remember the basics of the Trulian Drag Metric?
entries.translation: 我想您还记得 Trulian 阻力指标的基础知识吗？

entries.original: It's been a while, remind me.
entries.translation: 好久不见了，提醒一下。

entries.original: Yes, but my first officer might need a refresher.
entries.translation: 是的，但我的副驾驶可能需要复习一下。

entries.original:
At post-relativistic speeds, the metric tends to bring ships out of warp. It’s conceptually similar to friction in Newtonian systems, although the underlying physics is completely different. 

The effect is more pronounced near stars, planets or other objects that create entropic distortions in the warp manifold. Consequently, our ship drives are more efficient in deep space, a phenomenon referred to as the "Void Effect."
entries.translation:
在后相对论速度下，该度量往往会使船舶脱离曲速。它在概念上类似于牛顿系统中的摩擦，尽管底层物理原理完全不同。

这种效应在恒星、行星或其他在扭曲流形中产生熵扭曲的物体附近更为明显。因此，我们的船舶驱动装置在深空更加高效，这种现象被称为“虚空效应”。

entries.original:
We can boost this effect with void control surfaces, sometimes called "wings" due to their shape.

Of course, having a good drive to mass ratio helps the most with speed.

Having a very "wide" ship design increases void distortions, but this effect is fairly small.
entries.translation:
我们可以通过空隙控制表面来增强这种效果，由于其形状有时被称为“翅膀”。

当然，良好的驱动质量比对提高速度最有帮助。

非常“宽”的船舶设计会增加空隙扭曲，但这种影响相当小。

entries.original: So what did you learn from our trip through the gateway?
entries.translation: 那么您从我们的网关之旅中学到了什么？

entries.original:
Obviously, I was correct in believing it served a similar purpose to the wormhole stabilizers that Starcom constructed.

It's not powerful enough to create a wormhole to our universe, but it can create local bridges in the space manifold.
entries.translation:
显然，我相信它与斯达康建造的虫洞稳定器具有类似的用途，这是正确的。

它的威力不足以在我们的宇宙中创建一个虫洞，但它可以在空间流形中创建局部桥梁。

entries.original:
Whoever constructed it was technologically very advanced. Despite the lower power level, these gateways distort space much more efficiently that our stabilizers.

It's possible that if we can find more artifacts like these, we could open a wormhole home from this side.
entries.translation:
无论是谁建造的，技术都非常先进。尽管功率水平较低，但这些网关扭曲空间的效率比我们的稳定器要高得多。

如果我们能找到更多这样的文物，我们就有可能从这一边打开一个虫洞之家。

entries.original: Why is this wormhole universe classified?
entries.translation: 为什么要对这个虫洞宇宙进行分类？

entries.original:
That's a fair question.

A whole new universe is a major discovery. We should want all Starcom divisions as well as the civilian sectors studying this space.

There was a lot of arguing among the division heads on this topic.
entries.translation:
这是一个公平的问题。

一个全新的宇宙是一个重大发现。我们应该希望所有星康部门以及民用部门都研究这个领域。

对于这个话题，各部门负责人之间争论不休。

entries.original:
The final decision, as I've been informed, was that if the initial two-year research phase didn't uncover any serious threats here, Starcom would make a general announcement and expand exploration.

I suspect recent events might change that timeline.
entries.translation:
据我所知，最终决定是，如果最初的两年研究阶段没有发现任何严重威胁，斯达康将发布一般性公告并扩大探索。

我怀疑最近发生的事件可能会改变这个时间表。

entries.original: We found a debris field with containers from our home universe. Any idea why?
entries.translation: 我们发现了一个碎片场，里面有来自我们家乡宇宙的容器。知道为什么吗？

entries.original:
I'm sure you recall from your promotion brief the Xenium bomb Starcom equipped us with.

The bomb can't be sent through the wormhole without detonating, so they had to send the raw materials ahead, which contains quite a bit of degraded Xenium. We lost three cargo ships in the process. We managed to clean up the debris in this system, but some must have got caught in our neighbor's orbit.
entries.translation:
我相信您还记得您的促销简介中星康为我们配备的氙气炸弹。

炸弹无法在不爆炸的情况下通过虫洞，所以他们必须提前发送原材料，其中含有相当多的已降解的氙。在此过程中我们损失了三艘货船。我们设法清理了这个系统中的碎片，但有些碎片肯定被困在了我们邻居的轨道上。

entries.original:
During Celaeno's construction, they moved pretty fast. There was an accident with one of the construction ships that scattered leftover materials.

I guess some of it got captured by the gravity of the nearby system.
entries.translation:
在 Celaeno 的建设过程中，他们进展得相当快。其中一艘施工船发生事故，散落剩余材料。

我猜其中一些是被附近系统的重力捕获的。

entries.original: And this leftover material had experimental Xenium weapons because...
entries.translation: 这些剩余材料有实验性的 Xenium 武器，因为……

entries.original:
Ahhh... you found some of *those* materials.

Well, they did move pretty fast and there were some accidents.

Unfortunately I'm under some pretty strict orders on what I can disclose. The word "court-martial" was used more than once.
entries.translation:
啊……你找到了一些*那些*材料。

嗯，他们确实移动得很快，并且发生了一些事故。

不幸的是，我受到一些非常严格的命令来限制我可以透露的内容。 “军事法庭”一词被多次使用。

entries.original: Understood.
entries.translation: 明白了。

entries.original:
I have considered a potential... workaround.

If I can make a compelling case for a field promotion for you, I can give you clearance for some more details.

That's all I can say on that topic for now.
entries.translation:
我考虑过一个潜在的...解决方法。

如果我能为您提供令人信服的现场晋升理由，我可以为您提供更多细节的许可。

关于这个话题我现在只能说这么多。

entries.original: Did you tell Dr. Rama you were worried I was going to break the research lab?
entries.translation: 你有告诉拉玛博士你担心我会破坏研究实验室吗？

entries.original:
What? No, of course not. I have every confidence in you.

I think you might have misunderstood Dr. Rama's... sense of humor.
entries.translation:
什么？不，当然不。我对你充满信心。

我想你可能误解了罗摩博士的……幽默感。

entries.original:
I've had an opportunity to examine the object our outpost team found.

As I suspected, the nearby artifact is a wormhole generator. The object we found allows us to communicate with it. The last piece of the puzzle I deduced from your team's investigation of the buried ring.
entries.translation:
我有机会检查我们前哨小组发现的物体。

正如我所怀疑的，附近的神器是虫洞发生器。我们找到的对象允许我们与它进行通信。我从你的团队对埋藏戒指的调查中推断出最后一块拼图。

entries.original:
Coordinates are encoded as mathematical formulae describing warp space. Knowing the particular formulae for a location acts as a kind of key. My hypothesis is that if we input this formula into the wormhole generator, it will create a wormhole to a distant point in space.

We, meaning you, should test this hypothesis by activating the nearby artifact and entering its wormhole.
entries.translation:
坐标被编码为描述扭曲空间的数学公式。了解某个位置的特定公式可以作为一种关键。我的假设是，如果我们将这个公式输入虫洞生成器，它将创建一个通往太空中遥远点的虫洞。

我们，也就是你，应该通过激活附近的人工制品并进入它的虫洞来测试这个假设。

entries.original: And at that point will be another gateway we can use to return?
entries.translation: 到那时我们可以使用另一个网关返回吗？

entries.original:
Best case scenario, yes.

Worst case, you'll end up light years away and have to trek back in normal space. And I'll have the lab back to myself.

Be sure to pack some extra food.
entries.translation:
最好的情况，是的。

最坏的情况是，你最终会远离光年，不得不长途跋涉回到正常空间。我会把实验室归还给我自己。

一定要多带一些食物。

entries.original:
I see you've taken a break from blowing stuff up to make an actual, interesting discovery.

The polyhedral artifact you activated seems to discharge energy on the scale of a large solar flare every 14.3 seconds yet with minimal ionizing radiation. The new elementary particles it unveiled are quite intriguing.
entries.translation:
我发现你已经暂时放下了炸毁东西的工作，转而做出了一个实际的、有趣的发现。

您激活的多面体工件似乎每 14.3 秒就会释放一次大型太阳耀斑规模的能量，但电离辐射却极小。它揭示的新基本粒子非常有趣。

entries.original: Thanks. Does this mean you're going to be less condescending?
entries.translation: 谢谢。这是否意味着你会变得不那么居高临下？

entries.original:
I'll be less condescending today.

If you want me to be friendly tomorrow, make another discovery that changes our understanding of physics.
entries.translation:
今天我会少一些居高临下的态度。

如果你希望我明天表现得友好，请做出另一个改变我们对物理学理解的发现。

entries.original: So what actually is it?
entries.translation: 那么它到底是什么？

entries.original:
It's obviously way beyond our technology. With the brief amount of time I've had with the data, I've come up with two hypotheses.

One, it's some kind of beacon. The exotic particles it produces would be unmistakable at any distance.
entries.translation:
这显然远远超出了我们的技术范围。在我处理数据的时间很短的情况下，我提出了两个假设。

一，它是某种灯塔。它产生的奇异粒子在任何距离都不会被弄错。

entries.original:
Another possibility is that while this object generates a very large amount of energy, perhaps that energy is only part of the equation. Perhaps it requires some additional input, either information, material or even more energy to start whatever process it is designed for.

But frankly this is just speculation. The who and why of the artifact are of secondary importance: those particles illuminating our reality is what interests me.
entries.translation:
另一种可能性是，虽然该物体产生大量能量，但也许该能量只是方程的一部分。也许它需要一些额外的输入，要么是信息、材料，要么是更多的能量来启动它所设计的任何过程。

但坦率地说，这只是猜测。人造物的身份和原因是次要的：那些照亮我们现实的粒子才是我感兴趣的。

entries.original:
I am Dr. Rama. I'm the head of Celaeno's Research projects. We've spent the past month studying the nearby artifact and looking for clues to its operation on nearby planets.

Cdre Yu has just notified me that for "defense" reasons we're redirecting our priorities and I'm to place my lab at your disposal.

Incidentally, that's a figure of speech, you are not to break anything.
entries.translation:
我是罗摩博士。我是塞拉诺研究项目的负责人。我们在过去的一个月里研究了附近的神器，并寻找其在附近行星上运行的线索。

于中尉刚刚通知我，出于“防御”原因，我们正在调整我们的优先事项，我将把我的实验室交给你使用。

顺便说一句，这是一种比喻，你不可以破坏任何东西。

entries.original: I'll do my best.
entries.translation: 我将尽我所能。

entries.original: I'd prefer you do nothing at all, but your best will suffice.
entries.translation: 我宁愿你什么也不做，但你尽力就足够了。

entries.original:
Given my new directives, the object uncovered has given us some research data you can put to work.

If you'll meet me in the lab, I can educate you on our facilities.
entries.translation:
根据我的新指令，发现的物体为我们提供了一些可以用于工作的研究数据。

如果您在实验室见到我，我可以向您介绍我们的设施。

entries.original: Will do.
entries.translation: 会做。

entries.original: Why do you think I might break something?
entries.translation: 你为什么认为我可能会破坏某些东西？

entries.original:
I've reviewed [SHIP_NAME]'s logs. 

Let me say that there have been a *lot* of explosions around you.
entries.translation:
我已查看[SHIP_NAME]的日志。

让我说，你周围发生了“很多”爆炸。

entries.original: Some of those explosions weren't directly caused by us.
entries.translation: 其中一些爆炸并不是我们直接造成的。

entries.original: There have been zero explosions in this lab and I want to keep it that way.
entries.translation: 这个实验室一直是零爆炸，我想保持这种状态。

entries.original: I'm sensing that you are not happy about this.
entries.translation: 我感觉到你对此不高兴。

entries.original: Your sensors are calibrated correctly.
entries.translation: 您的传感器已正确校准。

entries.original:
When the wormhole collapsed, [SHIP_NAME] wasn't the only Starcom vessel on this side.

An archaeological research ship, The Aletheia, has been investigating nearby systems. She's well overdue. I want you to see what the delay is.
entries.translation:
当虫洞塌陷时，[SHIP_NAME]并不是这一侧唯一的星康飞船。

一艘考古研究船“Aletheia”号一直在调查附近的系统。她已经迟到了。我想让你看看延迟是什么。

entries.original: It's a bit of a trek, I'm afraid. You may want to optimize your ship for deep space speed. Lt. Milton may have some suggestions.
entries.translation: 恐怕这有点长途跋涉。您可能想要优化您的飞船以获得深空速度。米尔顿中尉可能会提出一些建议。

entries.original: Will do.
entries.translation: 会做。

entries.original: Was there anything else?
entries.translation: 还有别的事吗？

entries.original:
Excellent work finding the Aletheia.

You've proven quite capable, but it's a relief to know we'll have a second ship nearby while you continue your exploration of this space.
entries.translation:
寻找 Aletheia 的工作非常出色。

你已经证明了自己的能力，但当你继续探索这个空间时，知道我们附近会有第二艘船，这让你松了口气。

entries.original:
Now that your command crew have a bit of experience in the field, I am assigning them a small team of support personnel to [SHIP_NAME].

They won't participate in survey missions, but will speed up ship repairs.
entries.translation:
现在您的指挥人员在该领域已经有了一些经验，我将向他们指派一小队支持人员前往[SHIP_NAME]。

他们不会参加调查任务，但会加快船舶修理速度。

entries.original:
Welcome to Celaeno Station commander. 

I assume your appearance means Maia picked up our emergency beacon. And I hope [SHIP_NAME] is just the very small tip of a much larger spear of reinforcements coming soon?
entries.translation:
欢迎来到塞拉诺空间站指挥官。

我猜想你的出现意味着玛雅找到了我们的紧急信标。我希望 [SHIP_NAME] 只是即将到来的更大的援军的一小部分？

entries.original: Not exactly, no.
entries.translation: 不完全是，不。

entries.original: That sounds ominous. Go on.
entries.translation: 这听起来很不祥。继续。

entries.original: *Fill the Commodore in on what happened.*
entries.translation: *向准将报告发生的事情。*

entries.original:
That's very alarming.

The reason we sent the emergency beacon is that recently we've come under attack by vessels of unknown origin. We're calling them "Red Raiders" based on their markings for lack of any other information.

Now you're telling me there's another threat that's cut us off from support.
entries.translation:
这非常令人担忧。

我们之所以发出紧急信标，是因为最近我们遭到了来历不明的船只的袭击。由于缺乏任何其他信息，我们根据他们的标记将他们称为“红色袭击者”。

现在你告诉我还有另一个威胁使我们失去了支持。

entries.original:
For now, there doesn't seem to be anything that can be done about Maia Station or the ship that destroyed it.

But we can deal with the ships that have been attacking us. They're not terribly powerful and Celaeno's guns have kept them at bay.

We have a research outpost under development on an inner planet. The only other support ship on this side of the wormhole is out of comms range. Given these attacks and the lack of imminent reinforcements, I'll need your help evacuating the staff back to the station.
entries.translation:
目前，对于玛亚空间站或摧毁它的船只似乎无能为力。

但我们可以对付那些攻击我们的船只。他们的力量并不是非常强大，塞拉诺的枪已经将他们挡在了海湾之外。

我们在内行星上有一个正在开发的研究前哨站。虫洞这一侧唯一的另一艘支援船不在通讯范围内。鉴于这些袭击以及缺乏紧急增援，我需要你的帮助将工作人员疏散回车站。

entries.original: Can do.
entries.translation: 可以做。

entries.original:
That's what I hoped.

You'll need a survey lander. I've had Lt. Milton start making modifications on [SHIP_NAME]. See him in the Shipyard and then get our people back safe.
entries.translation:
这就是我所希望的。

你需要一个勘测着陆器。我已经让米尔顿中尉开始对[SHIP_NAME]进行修改。去造船厂见他，然后让我们的人安全回来。

entries.original: I'm counting on you to get our people back. Get it done.
entries.translation: 我指望你能把我们的人带回来。完成它。

entries.original:
The archaeological team has reported their findings to me. The nearby ring artifact that Dr. Rama says can be used as a transport gateway was built by an entity or culture referred to as "the Remnants".

Their technology may aid us in re-opening the wormhole from our side. In any event, it is far in advance of anything we have.
entries.translation:
考古队已经向我报告了他们的发现。拉玛博士说附近的环形神器可以用作传输网关，是由一个被称为“遗迹”的实体或文化建造的。

他们的技术可能会帮助我们从我们这边重新打开虫洞。无论如何，它远远领先于我们所拥有的一切。

entries.original:
Investigate the endpoint of this gateway. If you can find the source of these Red Raider ships, neutralize them if possible.

But your top priority is to find any similar Remnant artifacts or technology.
entries.translation:
调查此网关的端点。如果你能找到这些红色袭击者飞船的来源，尽可能消灭它们。

但你的首要任务是找到任何类似的遗迹文物或技术。

entries.original: We're on it.
entries.translation: 我们正在努力。

entries.original: Was there anything else?
entries.translation: 还有别的事吗？

entries.original: Dr. Rama seemed less than 100% certain that there would be a return gateway on the other side.
entries.translation: 罗摩博士似乎并不能百分百确定另一边是否有返回通道。

entries.original:
Nonsense.

Whatever her faults, she wouldn't have signed-off on the mission if she thought the risks were too high. 

Was there anything else?
entries.translation:
废话。

无论她有什么错误，如果她认为风险太高，她就不会签署这项任务。

还有别的事吗？

entries.original: If [SHIP_NAME] is one of our only vessels in this space, you'll need a full command crew for maximum efficiency and to conduct planetary surveys.
entries.translation: 如果[SHIP_NAME]是我们在此空间中唯一的船只之一，那么您将需要完整的指挥人员才能最大程度地提高效率并进行行星调查。

entries.original:
Some of the team members you evacuated from the outpost have volunteered.

They've been added to your crew roster, which you can review at any time.

They're admittedly a bit green, but I think with some experience they'll be officer material in no time.

Speaking of experience...
entries.translation:
您从前哨基地撤离的一些团队成员已经自愿加入。

他们已添加到您的船员名册中，您可以随时查看。

诚然，他们还有些新手，但我认为，凭借一些经验，他们很快就会成为军官的材料。

说到经验...

entries.original:
We've detected some ship movement around a nearby gas giant.  There also appears to be some activity on the surface of one of its moons.

I want you to check it out. The ships have similar energy readings as the Red Raiders, so use those resources to get [SHIP_NAME] ready for combat.
entries.translation:
我们检测到附近一颗气态巨行星周围有一些船只运动。其中一颗卫星的表面似乎也有一些活动。

我想让你检查一下。这些舰船具有与红色突袭者相似的能量读数，因此请使用这些资源让[SHIP_NAME]做好战斗准备。

entries.original: Will do.
entries.translation: 会做。

entries.original:
Well done, [PLAYER_LASTNAME].

Given our shortage of Starcom vessels here, you and your ship will need to take on an outsized role for your experience.
entries.translation:
干得好，[PLAYER_LASTNAME]。

鉴于我们这里缺乏星康船只，您和您的船只将需要为您的体验发挥巨大的作用。

entries.original:
Until Starcom re-opens the wormhole and sends reinforcements, establishing an outpost is a lower priority than strengthening our defenses.

I'm authorizing you to make full use of the resources recovered from the outpost to outfit [SHIP_NAME].

I'll talk to our research chief about getting you access to the lab as well.
entries.translation:
在星传重新打开虫洞并派遣增援之前，建立前哨基地的优先级比加强防御要低。

我授权你充分利用从前哨站回收的资源来装备[SHIP_NAME]。

我也会和我们的研究主管讨论让你进入实验室的问题。

entries.original: Unless there's anything else, I'll brief you on our next moves after you've had a chance to upgrade [SHIP_NAME].
entries.translation: 除非有其他事情，在您有机会升级 [SHIP_NAME] 后，我将向您介绍我们的下一步行动。

entries.original: No further questions.
entries.translation: 没有进一步的问题。

entries.original: I do have some questions.
entries.translation: 我确实有一些问题。

entries.original: I'm not surprised. I may not have answers, but I'll do my best.
entries.translation: 我不惊讶。我可能没有答案，但我会尽力。

entries.original:
Good, [SHIP_NAME] can conduct planetary surveys.

There's an artifact nearby that our researchers have been studying since we arrived. They think it might have a similar purpose to the wormhole stabilizers we built.

It seems intact but we haven't been able to interact with it yet.
entries.translation:
很好，[SHIP_NAME] 可以进行行星勘测。

附近有一件文物，自从我们到达以来我们的研究人员一直在研究它。他们认为它可能与我们建造的虫洞稳定器有类似的用途。

它看起来完好无损，但我们还无法与它进行交互。

entries.original:
We conducted a cursory survey of the nearby planets when we arrived, but it's possible something was missed. I want you to re-survey this system.

We also have an outpost under construction on a nearby planet, you're authorized to recover any resources there for [SHIP_NAME].
entries.translation:
当我们到达时，我们对附近的行星进行了粗略的调查，但可能遗漏了一些东西。我希望你重新调查一下这个系统。

我们还在附近的星球上建设了一个前哨站，您有权为 [SHIP_NAME] 回收那里的任何资源。

entries.original: On it.
entries.translation: 在上面。

entries.original: I have questions.
entries.translation: 我有疑问。

entries.original: I may not have a lot of answers, but I'll do my best.
entries.translation: 我可能没有太多答案，但我会尽我所能。

entries.original: Buried Ring
entries.translation: 埋环

entries.original:
The anomaly is a partially buried ring-shaped artifact, roughly 100 meters in diameter.

While technologically advanced, the structure shows signs of a design in progress, suggesting that this was an experimental device or prototype.
entries.translation:
该异常现象是一个部分埋藏的环形人工制品，直径约 100 米。

虽然技术先进，但该结构显示出正在进行的设计的迹象，表明这是一个实验设备或原型。

entries.original: The rocks and dirt nearby have undergone zero oxidation, so it was excavated quite recently.
entries.translation: 附近的岩石和泥土都经历了零氧化，因此是最近才被挖掘出来的。

entries.original:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] observes that while the structure is much too large to transport, it has gold connectors leading to what appears to be a data storage component.

If provided with power, it might be possible to access the data.
entries.translation:
[CREW_ENGINEERING] 观察到，虽然该结构太大而无法运输，但它具有金色连接器，通向似乎是数据存储组件的地方。

如果提供电源，则可以访问数据。

entries.original: Have [CREW_ENGINEERING] try to access the data.
entries.translation: 让[CREW_ENGINEERING]尝试访问数据。

entries.original:
The process turns out to be surprisingly tricky--the artifact reacts to energy from the lander in unexpected ways.

With careful attention, [CREW_ENGINEERING] is able to keep the power high enough to extract the data, but not damage the artifact or the lander.
entries.translation:
事实证明，这个过程出人意料地棘手——人造物以意想不到的方式对着陆器的能量做出反应。

只要细心留意，[CREW_ENGINEERING]就能够保持足够高的功率来提取数据，但不会损坏工件或着陆器。

entries.original:
The process turns out to be surprisingly tricky--the artifact reacts to energy from the lander in unexpected ways.

While trying to compensate for the unpredictable fluctuations, a sudden surge badly burns [CREW_ENGINEERING].

Despite their injuries they were able to capture most of the artifact's data before a feedback loop fried the alien device.
entries.translation:
事实证明，这个过程出人意料地棘手——人造物以意想不到的方式对着陆器的能量做出反应。

当试图补偿不可预测的波动时，突然的波动严重烧伤了[CREW_ENGINEERING]。

尽管他们受伤了，但他们还是能够在反馈回路烧毁外星装置之前捕获该神器的大部分数据。

entries.original: Celaeno Colony
entries.translation: 塞拉诺殖民地

entries.original:
The ground team is disappointed to abandon the outpost; they had been excavating the ruins of a civilization during a late period of the "Fallen Empire". The team had just uncovered an artifact with markings similar to the great structure in space near Celaeno.

But they quickly and professionally evacuate the object and vital materials to the lander.
entries.translation:
地面小组对放弃前哨基地感到失望；他们正在挖掘“堕落帝国”晚期的文明遗迹。该团队刚刚发现了一件文物，其标记与塞拉诺附近太空中的巨大结构相似。

但他们迅速而专业地将物体和重要材料疏散到着陆器。

entries.original: Impact Crater
entries.translation: 撞击坑

entries.original:
This is an old impact crater. [CREW_ASTRO] notes that the lack of erosion forces belies its true age, "These jag upthrusts will take hundreds of millennia to wear down."

At the center of the crater is a recent excavation site. Its familiar layout suggests a Starcom survey team excavated whatever was here.
entries.translation:
这是一个古老的撞击坑。 [CREW_ASTRO] 指出，侵蚀力的缺乏掩盖了它的真实年龄，“这些锯齿状的上冲需要数百年的时间才能磨损。”

火山口的中心是最近的挖掘地点。其熟悉的布局表明斯达康调查小组挖掘了这里的任何东西。

entries.original: Hidden Launch Pad
entries.translation: 隐藏发射台

entries.original:
The anomaly is difficult to spot from the air-- the lander makes several passes before [CREW_OBSERVATION] spots the target.

From a distance, it looks like an abandoned outpost that's gradually being erased by the elements.

Up close, it's apparent that the structure's surfaces have been camouflaged to the color and texture of the surrounding rock.
entries.translation:
从空中很难发现异常现象——着陆器在[CREW_OBSERVATION]发现目标之前经过了几次。

从远处看，它就像一个废弃的前哨基地，正在逐渐被自然元素抹去。

近距离观察，很明显该结构的表面已被伪装成周围岩石的颜色和纹理。

entries.original: Most of the useful equipment has been removed, but an unusual object directly connected to some tools of unknown purpose was left behind.
entries.translation: 大多数有用的设备已被移除，但留下了一个与一些用途不明的工具直接相连的不寻常物体。

entries.original: Not far from the platform there's some containers with the same camouflage treatment.
entries.translation: 距离平台不远的地方有一些经过同样迷彩处理的集装箱。

entries.original: Investigate the containers.
entries.translation: 调查容器。

entries.original: It's a cache of ship building components. Probably whoever left this base didn't have time or space for them.
entries.translation: 它是造船组件的缓存。也许离开这个基地的人都没有时间或空间了。

entries.original: Meteor Craters
entries.translation: 流星陨石坑

entries.original:
Several hundred square kilometers of this planet's surface are scarred with meteor impact craters.

Most of the craters have little to no debris, the meteorite having vaporized on impact. But in some, a chunk of the slag remains.

The team conducts a series of short flights in the lander, easily gathering them up.
entries.translation:
这颗行星的数百平方公里的表面布满了流星撞击的陨石坑。

大多数陨石坑几乎没有碎片，陨石在撞击时蒸发了。但在某些情况下，会留下一大块炉渣。

该团队在着陆器中进行了一系列短途飞行，轻松地将它们收集起来。

entries.original: These are obviously the result of the debris fields orbiting this star.
entries.translation: 这些显然是围绕这颗恒星运行的碎片场的结果。

entries.original: Polyhedral Artifact
entries.translation: 多面体神器

entries.original:
This massive artifact, several hundred kilometers along its long axis, is composed of an unknown material.

[CREW_ENGINEERING] determines that there is a door, but a component to operate it is missing. Based on the live connections, the required piece is triangular in shape and capable of conducting several hundred terawatts.
entries.translation:
这件巨大的文物沿着其长轴长达数百公里，由一种未知材料组成。

[CREW_ENGINEERING] 确定有一扇门，但缺少操作它的组件。根据实时连接，所需的部件呈三角形，能够传导数百太瓦的电流。

entries.original: Using the triangular object obtained from The Aletheia, the team is able to close the connection and a huge frictionless surface slides away, allowing the survey lander access to the interior.
entries.translation: 使用从 Aletheia 获得的三角形物体，团队能够关闭连接，巨大的无摩擦表面滑开，使测量着陆器能够进入内部。

entries.original:
Inside is a massive space that seems even larger than the exterior. Despite expanding in all directions, every path seems to converge at a single point: a small platform at the center of the unsettling geometry.

At its center is a black sphere. 

As the team approaches, the structure seems to shift in impossible ways.
entries.translation:
里面是一个巨大的空间，看起来比外面还要大。尽管向各个方向扩展，但每条路径似乎都汇聚在一个点：令人不安的几何形状中心的一个小平台。

它的中心是一个黑色的球体。

随着团队的临近，结构似乎以不可能的方式发生变化。

entries.original:
Suddenly, all the shapes seem to align perfectly in every dimension and the sphere begins to expand.

The team hastily retreats, but every path leads back inwards.

Just as the sphere seems about to engulf the lander, the craft and the team find themselves back outside the structure.
entries.translation:
突然，所有形状似乎在各个维度上都完美对齐，并且球体开始膨胀。

队伍匆忙撤退，但每条路都是向内走。

正当球体似乎即将吞没着陆器时，飞船和团队发现自己回到了结构之外。

entries.original:
This massive artifact has an apparent point of access, requiring a special connector to close the circuit.

The triangular artifact obtained from The Aletheia appears to match perfectly.
entries.translation:
这个巨大的工件有一个明显的接入点，需要特殊的连接器来闭合电路。

从阿勒忒亚获得的三角形神器看起来完美匹配。

entries.original: Stone Pyramids
entries.translation: 石金字塔

entries.original:
A cluster of carved stone pyramids are the only markers of civilization on this planet.

Penetrating radar shows the structures had interior cavities at one point, but have since been filled in. Small glyphs along the protruding edges register as writing with the universal translator.
entries.translation:
一组石雕金字塔是这个星球上唯一的文明标志。

穿透雷达显示，这些结构在某一点上有内部空洞，但后来已被填充。沿着突出边缘的小字形被记录为用通用翻译器书写的。

entries.original:
The text repeats:

*"And from his chariot, the Talonian pierced the sun with his lance, and then the Scintillating Jewel. Like a lure, with his lance he cast the jewel into the hidden sea, its light illuminating distant new shores. But the shores left behind were now in darkness."*
entries.translation:
文字重复：

*“从他的战车上，塔隆人用长矛刺穿了太阳，然后是闪烁的宝石。就像一个诱饵，他用长矛将宝石投进了隐藏的大海，它的光芒照亮了遥远的新海岸。但海岸留下了现在处于黑暗之中。”*

entries.original: A starfaring civilization must have built these. The fact that they did not also colonize or mine this planet suggests this location had deep cultural or religious significance.
entries.translation: 这些一定是某个星际文明建造的。他们并没有在这个星球上殖民或采矿，这一事实表明这个地点具有深刻的文化或宗教意义。

entries.original: Seaworld Captive
entries.translation: 海洋世界俘虏

entries.original:
It seems some climate disaster in the past century caused much of the surface of this planet to flood.

Judging from the visible technology, the planet was in a pre-space era.

The team lands atop one of the few tall structures to protrude above the sea surface, within which the anomaly signal originates.
entries.translation:
上个世纪的一些气候灾难似乎导致了这个星球的大部分表面被洪水淹没。

从可见技术来看，地球正处于前太空时代。

该小组降落在少数几个突出于海面的高层建筑之一的顶部，异常信号就源于此。

entries.original:
As [CREW_ENGINEERING] examines the architecture, a trapdoor suddenly opens, plunging them into the briny water. Before the team can react, they are dragged off into a submerged building by crab-like creatures wielding some kind of spearguns.

Fortunately, [CREW_ENGINEERING]'s suit telemetry shows they are unhurt and still with several hours of oxygen.
entries.translation:
当[CREW_ENGINEERING]检查建筑时，活板门突然打开，将他们扔进盐水中。在团队做出反应之前，他们被挥舞着某种鱼枪的螃蟹般的生物拖进了一座水下建筑。

幸运的是，[CREW_ENGINEERING]的宇航服遥测显示他们没有受伤，并且仍然需要几个小时的氧气。

entries.original: Have the team use their superior technology to attempt a rescue.
entries.translation: 让团队使用他们先进的技术来尝试救援。

entries.original:
Based on the aliens' observed  physiology, [CREW_BIOMED] correctly guesses that a series of low-energy electrical pulses would stun them, allowing the team to enter and disarm the aliens.

By the time they recovered their senses, the captors had become the prisoners. The creatures the offer their apologies and reparations for the "misunderstanding."
entries.translation:
根据外星人观察到的生理机能，[CREW_BIOMED]正确猜测一系列低能电脉冲会击晕他们，从而使团队能够进入并解除外星人的武装。

等他们回过神来的时候，抓捕者已经变成了俘虏。这些生物对“误会”表示歉意并做出赔偿。

entries.original:
After examining the nearby structures, [CREW_TACTICS] concludes that there is an interior location where it would make the most sense to hold a prisoner.

Taking advantage of the rusting structure and the lander's winch, the team removes the entire cell before the aliens have a chance to react.
entries.translation:
在检查了附近的建筑后，[CREW_TACTICS]得出结论，有一个内部位置最适合关押囚犯。

利用生锈的结构和着陆器的绞盘，团队在外星人有机会做出反应之前移除了整个牢房。

entries.original:
As the team rush the structure, [CREW_TACTICS] uses a concussive round to stun the captors. 

Unfortunately, the cramped interior amplified the effect, killing several of the creatures and  seriously wounding [CREW_ENGINEERING].
entries.translation:
当小队冲向建筑物时，[CREW_TACTICS] 使用震荡弹击晕捕获者。

不幸的是，狭窄的内部放大了这种影响，杀死了一些生物并严重伤害了[CREW_ENGINEERING]。

entries.original: Have [CREW_XENOCULTURE] try to negotiate with the aliens for [CREW_ENGINEERING]'s  release.
entries.translation: 让[CREW_XENOCULTURE]尝试与外星人谈判以释放[CREW_ENGINEERING]。

entries.original:
Via the universal translator, [CREW_XENOCULTURE]  establishes that the trap was meant for members of a rival group. 

Realizing the technological difference is not in their favor, the aliens are quite happy to release [CREW_ENGINEERING] along with a gift of some aluminum.
entries.translation:
通过通用翻译器，[CREW_XENOCULTURE]确定该陷阱是针对敌对组织的成员的。

意识到技术差异对他们不利，外星人非常高兴地释放了[CREW_ENGINEERING]以及一些铝的礼物。

entries.original:
[CREW_XENOCULTURE]'s initial efforts to secure [CREW_ENGINEERING]'s release are unsuccessful.

Eventually they resort to a classic trick of diplomacy: a bribe.
entries.translation:
[CREW_XENOCULTURE] 为确保 [CREW_ENGINEERING] 的释放所做的最初努力并未成功。

最终他们诉诸了一个经典的外交伎俩：贿赂。

entries.original:
[CREW_XENOCULTURE]'s efforts are met first with confusion, then increasing hostility after several unfortunate mis-translations.

The aliens refuse to surrender [CREW_ENGINEERING]. A more forceful approach may be the only option. Unfortunately, the team will have lost any element of surprise.
entries.translation:
[CREW_XENOCULTURE] 的努力首先遇到了混乱，然后在几次不幸的误译后敌意不断增加。

外星人拒绝投降[CREW_ENGINEERING]。更有力的方法可能是唯一的选择。不幸的是，球队将失去任何惊喜。

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: 阿勒忒亚

entries.original: Find the missing Starcom ship, The Aletheia.
entries.translation: 寻找失踪的星传飞船“阿勒忒亚号”。

entries.original: We should check out the star system near [COORD] that The Aletheia was investigating.
entries.translation: 我们应该检查一下 Aletheia 正在调查的 [COORD] 附近的恒星系统。

entries.original: This is the area that the Aletheia was reportedly investigating.
entries.translation: 据报道，这就是 Aletheia 正在调查的区域。

entries.original: We've entered the system where the Aletheia was last reported. We should look nearby for any signs of her.
entries.translation: 我们已经进入了最后报告 Aletheia 的系统。我们应该在附近寻找她的踪迹。

entries.original: We found The Aletheia. They were taken off guard in an attack by The Devout, but report that they are safe. We should let Cdre Yu know.
entries.translation: 我们找到了阿勒忒亚。他们在虔诚者的袭击中措手不及，但报告说他们很安全。我们应该让于长官知道。

entries.original: Thank the stars. I was afraid we were going to have to go back the long way.
entries.translation: 感谢星星。我担心我们要走很远的路。

entries.original: By the way, I did *not* need a refresher on that.
entries.translation: 顺便说一句，我*不需要*需要复习一下。

entries.original: Aletheia Destroyed
entries.translation: 阿勒忒亚被摧毁

entries.original:
After the destruction of The Aletheia, [PLAYER_NAME] was charged with "causing the destruction of, or allowing the destruction of a Starcom capital vessel", "dereliction of duty", and "aggressive incompetence."

They were sentenced to hard clerical duty for their natural life.
entries.translation:
在阿勒忒亚号被毁后，[PLAYER_NAME]被指控“导致毁坏或允许毁坏星康主力舰”、“玩忽职守”和“侵略性无能”。

他们因其自然生活而被判处严厉的文书工作。

entries.original: Reminder to longship teams, future support assignments for [SHIP_NAME] will be ad-hoc on Celaeno-Log channel. Anyone not currently scheduled for the Aletheia re-supply is responsible for checking alerts.
entries.translation: 提醒 longship 团队，[SHIP_NAME] 的未来支持任务将在 Celaeno-Log 频道上临时进行。目前未安排 Aletheia 补给的任何人都有责任检查警报。

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: 后勤

entries.original: LRS reporting Aletheia en-route. Longshipper Group 3 to docking muster.
entries.translation: LRS 报告 Aletheia 正在途中。 Longshipper Group 3 即将进坞集合。

entries.original: Local cluster map updated with data from [SHIP_NAME] and The Aletheia.
entries.translation: 使用 [SHIP_NAME] 和 The Aletheia 的数据更新了本地集群地图。

entries.original: Cartography
entries.translation: 制图学

entries.original: Aletheia Lost
entries.translation: 迷失真理

entries.original:
[SHIP_NAME] spent many months searching for clues to re-open the wormhole. Eventually, Celaeno's supplies began to dwindle.

The crew of Celaeno and [SHIP_NAME] were forced to relocate to a Class M planet they had discovered.

Perhaps if the Aletheia had survived, things might have ended differently.
entries.translation:
[SHIP_NAME]花了几个月的时间寻找重新打开虫洞的线索。最终，塞拉埃诺的供应开始减少。

Celaeno 和 [SHIP_NAME] 的船员被迫迁移到他们发现的 M 级行星。

也许如果阿勒忒亚号幸存下来，事情的结局可能会有所不同。

entries.original: Test Aletheia & Polyhedral
entries.translation: 测试真理与多面体

entries.original: Full test of Arrival
entries.translation: 全面到达测试

entries.original: Celaeno Destroyed
entries.translation: 塞拉诺被摧毁

entries.original:
Following the destruction Celaeno Station, [SHIP_NAME] continued the search for a way back home.

Eventually the crew got tired of looking, mutinied, and settled on the next M1 planet they came across.
entries.translation:
塞拉埃诺站被毁后，[SHIP_NAME]继续寻找回家的路。

最终，船员们厌倦了寻找，发生叛变，并定居在他们遇到的下一颗 M1 行星上。

entries.original: Beyond the Gateway
entries.translation: 超越门户

entries.original: Dr. Rama believes she has figured out how to interface with the gateway artifact. Cdre Yu wants us to investigate where it leads.
entries.translation: 拉玛博士相信她已经弄清楚如何与网关神器进行交互。于长官要我们调查它的走向。

entries.original: Dr. Rama believes we should now be able to interface with the gateway artifact.
entries.translation: Rama 博士认为我们现在应该能够与网关工件进行交互。

entries.original: We should use the nearby gateway to try to reach the region at [COORD].
entries.translation: 我们应该使用附近的网关尝试到达 [COORD] 的区域。

entries.original: I've marked the coordinates the equation points to on our map. Now let's see if that gateway will take us there. It'd be a long walk in normal space.
entries.translation: 我已经在地图上标记了方程指向的坐标。现在让我们看看这个网关是否能带我们到达那里。在正常空间里这将是一次很长的步行。

entries.original: Due to anticipated shortages, coffee in the commissary is limited to 500ml per diem, non-transferrable. Synthcafe is available.
entries.translation: 由于预计会出现短缺，小卖部的咖啡每天仅限 500 毫升，且不可转让。 Synthcafe 可用。

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: 后勤

entries.original: The gateway led to a distant region of this new universe. We should investigate the nearby sectors.
entries.translation: 大门通向这个新宇宙的遥远区域。我们应该调查附近的部门。

entries.original: Some locations on the star map may require that you zoom out to see.
entries.translation: 星图上的某些位置可能需要缩小才能看到。

entries.original: MOUSE_WHEEL to zoom, left mouse to pan
entries.translation: MOUSE_WHEEL 进行缩放，鼠标左键进行平移

entries.original: You can optionally zoom to the cursor for a closer look at distant map objects.
entries.translation: 您可以选择缩放光标以更仔细地查看远处的地图对象。

entries.original: CTRL + MOUSE_WHEEL to zoom to cursor
entries.translation: CTRL + MOUSE_WHEEL 缩放至光标

entries.original: As we hoped, the gateway provided a near instantaneous means to reach another like it.
entries.translation: 正如我们所希望的，该网关提供了一种近乎即时的方式来到达另一个类似的地方。

entries.original: Arrival Intro
entries.translation: 抵达介绍

entries.original: Deep Space Gravity
entries.translation: 深空引力

entries.original: We've detected a void drag effect in deep space, far from the nearest star or planet.
entries.translation: 我们在远离最近恒星或行星的深空中检测到了虚空阻力效应。

entries.original:
That's odd. I'm detecting a void drag effect, but the nearest celestial object on the scanners is too far away.

Maybe a rogue planet or other dark object?
entries.translation:
这很奇怪。我正在检测虚空阻力效应，但扫描仪上最近的天体距离太远。

也许是一颗流氓行星或其他黑暗物体？

entries.original: First detected at [SHIP_COORD]
entries.translation: 首次在 [SHIP_COORD] 检测到

entries.original: Remember that weird void drag effect I mentioned? I calculated the tangent at peak in Byrol-Nguyen space and marked where I think its origin.
entries.translation: 还记得我提到的奇怪的虚空阻力效果吗？我计算了 Byrol-Nguyen 空间中峰值处的切线，并标记了我认为其起源的位置。

entries.original: [CREW_ASTRO] has calculated the approximate origin of the void drag effect, located at [COORD].
entries.translation: [CREW_ASTRO] 已计算出虚空阻力效应的大致原点，位于 [COORD]。

entries.original: As we explore this region, it may be useful to make log entries of observations or things you think we should return to.
entries.translation: 当我们探索这个区域时，记录观察结果或您认为我们应该返回的事情可能会很有用。

entries.original: Right-click on the map to add notes.
entries.translation: 右键单击地图可添加注释。

entries.original: This must be the source of the gravitational distortion. Scanners show it's hundreds of times denser than solid Neutronium.
entries.translation: 这一定是引力扭曲的根源。扫描仪显示它的密度是固体中子的数百倍。

entries.original: We've found the source of the gravitational field: a polyhedral artifact of massive scale.
entries.translation: 我们已经找到了引力场的来源：一个大规模的多面体人造物。

entries.original: I'm detecting a build-up of energy from inside the artifact.
entries.translation: 我检测到神器内部正在积聚能量。

entries.original: We've figured out how to "activate" the artifact and now it seems to be discharging massive amounts of energy at regular intervals.
entries.translation: 我们已经弄清楚了如何“激活”该神器，现在它似乎会定期释放大量能量。

entries.original:
These discharges seem harmless to us. It's mostly particles that don't interact with baryonic matter.

But I have no idea what it's actually *doing.*
entries.translation:
这些放电似乎对我们无害。它主要是不与重子物质相互作用的粒子。

但我不知道它实际上*在做什么。*

entries.original: The artifact requires a special highly-conductive component to access.
entries.translation: 该工件需要特殊的高导电组件才能访问。

entries.original: Ship Activity
entries.translation: 船舶活动

entries.original: Celaeno detected ship movement around a nearby gas giant.
entries.translation: 塞拉诺探测到附近一颗气态巨行星周围的船只运动。

entries.original: Cdre. Yu wants us to investigate the planet at [COORD] where activity was detected.
entries.translation: 干部。 Yu 希望我们调查位于 [COORD] 的行星，在那里检测到了活动。

entries.original: LRS reporting [SHIP_NAME] en-route. Longshipper Group 2 to docking muster.
entries.translation: LRS 报告[SHIP_NAME]正在途中。 Longshipper Group 2 即将进坞集合。

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: 后勤

entries.original: You can get a wider view of known objects, including planets on our navigational map.
entries.translation: 您可以更广泛地了解已知物体，包括我们导航地图上的行星。

entries.original: Press [M] or [MIDDLE_MOUSE] to toggle map view.
entries.translation: 按 [M] 或 [MIDDLE_MOUSE] 切换地图视图。

entries.original: This must be the artifact that Dr. Rama talked about. Whoever built it must have very advanced engineering abilities.
entries.translation: 这一定就是罗摩博士所说的神器。建造它的人必须具有非常先进的工程能力。

entries.original: Evacuate Outpost
entries.translation: 撤离前哨基地

entries.original: Since Celaeno has started coming under attack by unknown ships, the Commodore wants us to evacuate the outpost they established.
entries.translation: 由于塞拉埃诺开始受到不明船只的攻击，海军准将希望我们撤离他们建立的前哨基地。

entries.original: Evacuate the outpost on the inner planet at [COORD]
entries.translation: 撤离内行星 [COORD] 的前哨基地

entries.original: Medical Group 1 to Disembark Area 3 to evaluate returning outpost crew.
entries.translation: 第 1 医疗组离开区域 3 以评估返回的前哨站人员。

entries.original: Medical
entries.translation: 医疗的

entries.original: We should return the outpost crew to Celaeno for evaluation and debriefing.
entries.translation: 我们应该将前哨站人员送回塞拉诺进行评估和汇报。

entries.original:
The team is eager to learn more about the artifact they found.

You can order an analysis from the "Cargo" tab of the ship status display.
entries.translation:
该团队渴望更多地了解他们发现的文物。

您可以从船舶状态显示的“货物”选项卡中订购分析。

entries.original: [SHIP_INFO] to open the ship status.
entries.translation: [SHIP_INFO] 打开船舶状态。

entries.original: Hostile ships detected. Weapons ready.
entries.translation: 发现敌对船只。武器准备好了。

entries.original: We've analyzed some kind of alien navigation device uncovered by the outpost team.
entries.translation: 我们分析了前哨小组发现的某种外星导航设备。

entries.original: Research Lab
entries.translation: 研究实验室

entries.original: Introduce the player to Dr. Rama and using the research lab.
entries.translation: 向玩家介绍拉玛博士并使用研究实验室。

entries.original:
This interface shows research technologies available. Use it to direct our computer's research.

I recommend at least researching "Turbo Thrust". It'll speed up your exploration significantly.
entries.translation:
该界面显示可用的研究技术。用它来指导我们计算机的研究。

我建议至少研究“涡轮推力”。它将显着加快您的探索速度。

entries.original: Impressive. You didn't break anything.
entries.translation: 感人的。你没有破坏任何东西。

entries.original: Shipyard Tutorial
entries.translation: 造船厂教程

entries.original: As per Cdre Yu's orders, I've gotten [SHIP_NAME] a bit more combat-ready, but it still needs a survey lander. Select "Utilities" from the module category list, then click drag a lander.
entries.translation: 按照余中校的命令，我已经让[SHIP_NAME]做好了一些战斗准备，但它仍然需要一个勘测着陆器。从模块类别列表中选择“实用程序”，然后单击拖动着陆器。

entries.original: Join the module with your ship by dragging it and connecting it to an open edge. The edge will turn green showing a valid connection.
entries.translation: 通过拖动模块并将其连接到开放边缘，将模块与您的飞船连接起来。边缘将变成绿色，表示连接有效。

entries.original:
Good. [SHIP_NAME] can now conduct planetary survey landings. You should feel free to experiment with different ship designs-- we have a lossless reclimator, so you won't lose any resources. 

Just drag a module off the ship to remove or reposition it.
entries.translation:
好的。 [SHIP_NAME] 现在可以进行行星勘测着陆。您应该随意尝试不同的船舶设计——我们有无损调节器，因此您不会损失任何资源。

只需将模块拖离飞船即可将其移除或重新放置。

entries.original: You can rotate a module prior to placement by pressing [A/D]. Asymmetric modules can be mirrored by pressing [X].
entries.translation: 您可以在放置前按 [A/D] 旋转模块。按 [X] 可以镜像非对称模块。

entries.original: There is another junior research opening, apply Celaeno-Res:JRAMA.
entries.translation: 还有另一个初级研究空缺，申请 Celaeno-Res:JRAMA。

entries.original: Research
entries.translation: 研究

entries.original: A battle station drill will be conducted between 0900-2100 tomorrow.
entries.translation: 明天0900-2100之间将进行战斗站演习。

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: 命令

entries.original: Congratulations to Lt. Ashley Phobos-Gellman and Jeffrey Phobos-Gellman on the birth of healthy twins, Samantha and Octavia.
entries.translation: 祝贺 Ashley Phobos-Gellman 中尉和 Jeffrey Phobos-Gellman 健康双胞胎 Samantha 和 Octavia 的诞生。

entries.original: Operations
entries.translation: 运营

entries.original:
This is a test of the updated wormhole stabilizer relay antennae.

Any crew aboard Celaeno who see this notification send an ACK message. You should receive a counter-reply at the next wormhole open in 48 hours.
entries.translation:
这是对更新后的虫洞稳定器中继天线的测试。

Celaeno 上的任何船员看到此通知后都会发送 ACK 消息。您应该会在 48 小时内下一个虫洞打开时收到反答复。

entries.original: Operations
entries.translation: 运营

entries.original: Mandatory Xenium safety review for all lonshippers in Loading Extension Jupiter.
entries.translation: 对 Loading Extension Jupiter 中的所有 lonshippers 进行强制性 Xenium 安全审查。

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: 后勤

entries.original: Aletheia crew rotation will begin at 0500 tomorrow, sharp.
entries.translation: Aletheia 船员轮换将于明天 0500 整开始。

entries.original: Aletheia
entries.translation: 真理

entries.original: There is another junior research opening, apply Celaeno-Res:JRAMA. This is not a repost. This is a new posting for the same position.
entries.translation: 还有另一个初级研究空缺，申请 Celaeno-Res:JRAMA。这不是转发。这是同一职位的新职位。

entries.original: Research
entries.translation: 研究

entries.original: Celaeno's last window for a longwave transmission to Maia for relay is tomorrow at 1435. Your messages home should be submitted today, by 1600, to allow for clearance review.
entries.translation: Celaeno 向 Maia 进行长波传输的最后一个窗口是明天 1435。您的信息应该在今天 1600 之前提交，以便进行许可审查。

entries.original: Operations
entries.translation: 运营

entries.original: Bellerophon departing for wormhole at 1340. Next re-supply is in 15 days, 3 hours.
entries.translation: 柏勒罗丰于 1340 点出发前往虫洞。下次补给将在 15 天零 3 小时后进行。

entries.original: Operations
entries.translation: 运营

entries.original: Cdts. Pirx and Rhea to simulations for survey team qualification re-test.
entries.translation: CDTS。 Pirx 和 Rhea 进行模拟，以进行调查小组资格的重新测试。

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: 命令

entries.original: Unknown vessels detected. All on-duty to ready stations.
entries.translation: 发现不明船只。所有人都到准备好的车站值班。

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: 命令

entries.original: ALL PERSONEL TO BATTLE STATIONS. THIS IS NOT A DRILL. Non-critical suspend, emergency stations.
entries.translation: 所有人员前往战地。这不是演习。非关键暂停、紧急站。

entries.original: Command (Emergency)
entries.translation: 指挥（紧急）

entries.original: Battle Station Alert over, non-critical resume.
entries.translation: 战斗站警报结束，非关键恢复。

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: 命令

entries.original: Post-action general debrief on Celaeno-Mil channel.
entries.translation: Celaeno-Mil 频道的行动后一般汇报。

entries.original: Command
entries.translation: 命令

entries.original: LRS reporting early wormhole burst signal. Longshipper Group 2 to docking muster.
entries.translation: LRS 报告早期虫洞爆发信号。 Longshipper Group 2 即将进坞集合。

entries.original: Logistics
entries.translation: 后勤

entries.original: Cargo Clean Up II
entries.translation: 货物清理 II

entries.original: We've found a debris field that looks like it's from our own space.
entries.translation: 我们发现了一个看起来像是来自我们自己的太空的碎片场。

entries.original:
Deja Vu.

These containers have similar markings to the ones spilled by that cargo ship near Maia. I wonder how they got here.
entries.translation:
似曾相识。

这些集装箱的标记与马亚附近那艘货船泄漏的集装箱类似。我想知道他们是怎么来到这里的。

entries.original:
Hmm.

I've seen this kind of controller used by military division in some research projects. Extremely high energy, but impractical as a weapon.
entries.translation:
唔。

我在一些研究项目中见过军事部门使用的这种控制器。能量极高，但作为武器不实用。

entries.original: The debris has components [CREW_TACTICS] identifies as possibly from Starcom military research. Perhaps Cdre. Yu can shed some light?
entries.translation: [CREW_TACTICS] 认为碎片中的成分可能来自 Starcom 军事研究。也许Cdre。你能透露一些信息吗？

entries.original: Cdre Yu has hinted that if he can give [PLAYER_NAME] a promotion, he'll be able to explain.
entries.translation: 于中队长暗示，如果他能给[PLAYER_NAME]升职，他就能解释。

entries.original: Arrival
entries.translation: 到达

entries.original: We should head to Celaeno Station and update the Commodore on what happened.
entries.translation: 我们应该前往塞拉埃诺站并向准将通报所发生的情况。

entries.original: Sensors show that the warp field holding the wormhole open is collapsing.
entries.translation: 传感器显示，使虫洞保持打开状态的曲速场正在崩溃。

entries.original: Gravimetric scans show the wormhole is still there, but it's collapsed down to Planck scale.
entries.translation: 重力扫描显示虫洞仍然存在，但它已经塌陷到普朗克尺度。

entries.original:
I've detected a Starcom beacon on our scanners. I've marked its position in your HUD.

That must be the station that Maia's commander mentioned. We should make contact with them and let them know what has happened.
entries.translation:
我在我们的扫描仪上检测到了 Starcom 信标。我已经在你的 HUD 中标记了它的位置。

那肯定是玛雅指挥官提到的那个车站。我们应该与他们取得联系，让他们知道发生了什么事。

entries.original: Visit Celaeno
entries.translation: 游览塞拉埃诺

entries.original: Alien Device
entries.translation: 外星装置

entries.original: Device with alien markings the outpost team recently uncovered.
entries.translation: 前哨站团队最近发现了带有外星人标记的设备。

entries.original: This device transforms geometric information from Euclidean space to an esoteric representation of warp space. May be a navigational device.
entries.translation: 该设备将几何信息从欧几里得空间转换为扭曲空间的深奥表示。可能是导航设备。

entries.original: Intricate Triangles
entries.translation: 错综复杂的三角形

entries.original: An intricate object composed of nesting triangles made of an unknown material. The Aletheia reported that they uncovered it during an anomaly survey.
entries.translation: 由未知材料制成的嵌套三角形组成的复杂物体。 Aletheia 报告说，他们在一次异常调查中发现了它。

entries.original: The material has close to zero resistance. Conducting all of the ship's free energy through it didn't even make it warm.
entries.translation: 该材料的电阻接近于零。通过它传导船上所有的自由能甚至不会使其变暖。

entries.original: Starcom Components
entries.translation: 斯达康组件

entries.original: Some equipment with Starcom markings.
entries.translation: 一些带有 Starcom 标记的设备。

entries.original: A device for controlling Xenium reactions. Since this is our own technology, we're not likely to learn much scientifically from this debris.
entries.translation: 一种控制Xenium反应的装置。由于这是我们自己的技术，我们不太可能从这些碎片中学到很多科学知识。

entries.original: Helium Giant
entries.translation: 氦巨星

entries.original: Gas giants are usually 99% hydrogen. This giant is mostly helium, suggesting that this planet underwent partial fusion at some point.
entries.translation: 气态巨行星通常 99% 是氢。这个巨行星主要是氦，这表明这颗行星在某个时刻经历了部分聚变。

entries.original: Nexus Topology
entries.translation: Nexus 拓扑

entries.original: That gateway projected us through a space-time topology like the wormhole that pulled us into this universe. We essentially solved an equation that redefined the relationship between two points in space. Amazing!
entries.translation: 那个网关将我们投射到时空拓扑结构中，就像虫洞一样，将我们拉入这个宇宙。我们本质上解决了一个方程，重新定义了空间中两点之间的关系。惊人的！

entries.original: Outpost Item
entries.translation: 前哨站物品

entries.original: The outpost team has partially decoded the markings on the item they found. It seems to a navigational device of some kind?
entries.translation: 前哨小组已部分解码了他们发现的物品上的标记。它似乎是某种导航设备？

entries.original: Artifact Discharge
entries.translation: 神器放电

entries.original:
The artifact has discharged a *massive* amount of energy.

We just discovered a half-dozen previously unknown particles.
entries.translation:
该神器释放出“大量”能量。

我们刚刚发现了六种以前未知的粒子。

entries.original: Raider Debris
entries.translation: 袭击者碎片

entries.original: Analysis of the raider debris shows these were unmanned drones. They lack any kind of warp drive but have an interesting autonomous navigation system.
entries.translation: 对袭击者残骸的分析表明这些是无人驾驶飞机。他们缺乏任何形式的曲速驱动，但有一个有趣的自主导航系统。

entries.original: Buried Ring Data
entries.translation: 埋环数据

entries.original: The data recovered from the buried ring is an exotic mathematical description of warp space. Possibly a coordinate system?
entries.translation: 从埋藏环中恢复的数据是对扭曲空间的奇异数学描述。可能是坐标系？

entries.original: Wormhole Formulae
entries.translation: 虫洞公式

entries.original: The alien field equations we uncovered are encoded coordinates intended to program the artifact we discovered.
entries.translation: 我们发现的外星场方程是编码坐标，旨在对我们发现的工件进行编程。

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: 阿勒忒亚

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: 阿勒忒亚

entries.original: The Aletheia
entries.translation: 阿勒忒亚
